entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 15 except 9 along the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 15 except 9 along the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 26 April 2023
